title: Diary of Steve the Noob 17 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: 15,000 words and 17 pictures. Steve finally climbs out of his depression hole thanks to the help of his friends. Now that he is back and ready for action, what will he find in his beloved village? This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
